div.p: Apple Benefits is seeking a dynamic and seasoned individual to manage various initiatives within the global and US healthcare benefits programs. This is an exciting opportunity for the right individual to support Apple’s healthcare strategy and impact the health and wellbeing of our employees and families.

ul.li: Demonstrated experience working with US Healthcare Plans including strategic design, vendor management, financial and clinical data analytics
Experience implementing healthcare strategies to drive quality, lower spend and improved experience engaging with accountable care organizations or onsite clinics
Experience using data warehouse solutions a plus
Demonstrated project management skills and ability to collaborate with internal and external partners on projects
Successful influencing vendors and driving negotiations
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong knowledge and experience of US corporate benefits, international experience a plus
Strong organizational abilities and attention to detail
Self-starter, skilled at effectively managing multiple priorities and tasks in a complex, fast paced environment
Strong financial acumen and analytical skills
Fluent using basic technology tools (e.g. Pages, Numbers, Keynote)
Experience building relationships with key external organizations

div.p: - Lead implementation of several US Healthcare initiatives including Accountable Care organizations and value based solutions - Drive strategic partnerships with healthcare partners in key marketplaces - Drive engagement between healthcare teams and wellness centers to build custom solutions for Apple aligned with overall healthcare strategy - Evaluate new eternal solutions to support strategy - Support implementation of data warehouse solution - Engagement with healthcare business team to drive towards the triple aim of quality, cost and experience with innovative solutions. - Manage and support US and Global healthcare programs - Responsible for compliance, vendor performance and processes related to healthcare programs. - Support and facilitate vendor audits, contract negotiations and service level agreements to optimize vendor performance. - Drive program strategy through market assessment, vendor capability and employee experience - Monitor and track budgets, forecasts related to assigned vendors - Support Health Care reform employer requirements engaging with internal business partners, consultants and vendors to mitigate excise tax. - Review and develop online and written benefits communications internally or from vendors - Consult and advise on escalated employee issues or appeals with HR Helpline - Partner closely with internal partners including international benefits team Finance, Procurement, Legal and Payroll - Manage or assist with department/program administration and support. - Participation in various benefit surveys and benchmarking - Comfortable dealing and resolving escalated employee issues
Bachelor’s Degree and 7+ years of benefits experience in a large organization Experience in the high-tech and/or retail industry a plus
